canonical_gutts.capability: Access and load pending calendar invitations and scheduled meetings requiring decisions
alternative_capabilities: Access and fetch all scheduled calendar events from the user's calendar system

canonical_gutts.capability: Calculate required preparation time based on meeting type, importance, and complexity
alternative_capabilities: Assess whether a meeting requires dedicated focus time based on its context and importance

canonical_gutts.capability: Suggest specific changes (decline, delegate, shorten, consolidate meetings)
alternative_capabilities: Suggest actionable strategies to free up time (e.g., decline, shorten, delegate)

canonical_gutts.capability: Send calendar invitation to specified attendee with meeting details

alternative_names: Update User Calendar Status for Thursday Afternoon
canonical_gutts.capability: Set user's availability/status for the blocked time (busy/away/focus time)
alternative_capabilities: Set user’s calendar availability status (e.g., Free, Busy, Out of Office) for the cleared time window

canonical_gutts.capability: Find available conference room for in-person meeting and reserve it
alternative_capabilities: Locate and reserve an available physical meeting room matching the selected time slot

canonical_gutts.capability: Rank and select best time considering all constraints (hard, soft, preferences)
alternative_capabilities: Choose the best available time slot based on constraints, preferences, and minimal disruption

canonical_gutts.capability: Assign time to each agenda item and format for professional distribution
alternative_capabilities: Display the proposed agenda to the user for approval or edits

canonical_gutts.capability: Access and load all relevant documents, presentations, and data for the meeting
alternative_capabilities: Access and collect all relevant documents and resources for the specified senior leadership meeting

canonical_gutts.capability: Condense complex topics into 3 concise, high-impact discussion points
alternative_capabilities: List all significant topics identified from the analysis for potential discussion

canonical_gutts.capability: Get meeting information (attendees list, meeting time, purpose/subject)
alternative_capabilities: Retrieve date, time, and participant list from the identified meeting

alternative_names: Retrieve Company Background for Customer Beta
canonical_gutts.capability: Gather information about customer Beta company (industry, size, products, recent news)
alternative_capabilities: Gather company-level information such as industry, size, recent news

alternative_names: Determine Topics of Interest for Each Attendee
canonical_gutts.capability: Identify topics each attendee cares about based on communication history, role, and context
alternative_capabilities: Analyze historical interactions or preference data to identify topics each attendee cares about
